attributes.action: Remove the new driving restrictions on Ham Park Road, E7.
attributes.additional_details: Creating huge traffic overflow, and punitively impacting residents of Ham Park road by imprisoning them on their road without a means to exit, or enter, away from mass droves of traffic. Permit holders of Ham Park road remain ineligible to navigate the road they live on.
attributes.background: Remove the new driving restrictions on Ham Park Road, E7.

rejection.details: Driving restrictions on local roads are the responsibility of the local council, rather than a decision about policy or legislation that is made by the Government or Parliament. You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
